import React, {useState} from "react" import {minutesToDuration} from "../utils/duration/index" function WorkButtons(){ const {focusTime, isTimerRunning} = props return(
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration. Build logic to increase and decrease time value in Pomodoro.js and pass in as state. Need two onClicks on buttons with handlers that are passed down from Pomodoro.js */} Focus Duration: 25:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
) } export default WorkButtons
